snippet: The former Staten Island physician, Felix Lanting, who has a frail wife who depends on him for care, was given six months of house arrest for selling oxycodone.
abstract: Felix Lanting, 85-year-old former doctor accused of selling prescription painkiller oxycodone from his house on Staten Island, is sentenced to six months of house arrest and five years of probation out of deference to his advanced age and responsibilities caring for his ailing wife.
lead_paragraph: The former Staten Island physician, Felix Lanting, who has a frail wife who depends on him for care, was given six months of house arrest for selling oxycodone.

headline.seo: No Jail Time for Doctor, 85, Guilty of Drug Charge
headline.main: No Jail Time for Ex-Doctor, 85, Convicted of Drug Charge
headline.print_headline: No Jail for Former Doctor, 85, on a Drug Charge
